about.appFeatures: Manage AI prompts + variable filling + category tags
about.newVersionDesc: New version {version} has been released, it is recommended to update in time.

aiConfig.addConfigDesc: Add new AI service configuration, supports multiple interfaces.
aiConfig.clickTestConnectionTip: Click the "Test Connection" button on the left to automatically get available model list
aiConfig.customModelTip: If the model you need is not in the default model list, you can manually enter it here
aiConfig.multipleConfigsWarning: You have multiple enabled AI configurations, it is recommended to set a global preferred configuration
aiConfig.noConfigs: No AI configurations yet, come add the first one!
aiConfig.subtitle: Manage and test your AI service connection configurations
aiConfig.testConnectionAndGetModels: Test connection and get model list
aiConfig.title: AI Configuration Management

aiGenerator.addConfigFirst: Please add and enable at least one AI configuration to use the generation feature
aiGenerator.confirmDeleteHistory: Are you sure you want to delete this generation record?
aiGenerator.requirementPlaceholder: Describe the prompt you want to generate, e.g., writing assistant, code review, translation tool, etc.
aiGenerator.resultPlaceholder: Generated prompt will be displayed here...
aiGenerator.title: AI Prompt Generator

closeBehavior.askTip: Show dialog for you to choose

cloudBackup.backupDescription: Manage cloud backup files, support create, restore and delete operations
cloudBackup.confirmDeleteBackup: Are you sure you want to delete this cloud backup?
cloudBackup.noCloudBackups: No cloud backups yet, please create backup first
cloudBackup.storageDescription: Configure WebDAV or iCloud Drive storage for cloud backup functionality

dataManagement.confirmClearDatabase: Are you sure you want to clear the entire database?
dataManagement.confirmDeleteBackup: Are you sure you want to delete this backup?
dataManagement.exportDescription: Select partial data for readable format export, temporarily unable to restore to application.
dataManagement.formatNoteText: AI configuration data contains complex object structures so headers are not uniform, only supports export as JSON format.
dataManagement.fullBackupDescription: Export complete backup package, or import complete backup from package. Exported data will contain sensitive information such as API keys in AI configuration. Please keep export files safe to avoid leakage.
dataManagement.maintenanceDescription: When encountering data anomalies, you can try to repair the database
dataManagement.noBackups: No backup versions yet, please create a backup first
dataManagement.securityWarningText: You have selected to export AI configuration, the exported data will contain sensitive information such as API keys. Please keep export files safe to avoid leakage.

language.description: Choose the display language for the application
language.title: Language Settings

promptManagement.adjustPromptInstruction: Please improve the prompt according to the following adjustment instructions.
promptManagement.categoryHasPrompts: This category still has prompts and cannot be deleted
promptManagement.categoryManageDesc: Manage your prompt categories, create, edit or delete categories
promptManagement.confirmBatchDelete: Are you sure you want to delete these {count} prompts? This operation cannot be undone.
promptManagement.confirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete category "{name}"?
promptManagement.contentPlaceholder: Enter prompt content, use {{variableName}} to define variables

detailModal.confirmDeleteDebugRecord: Confirm to delete the debug record
detailModal.confirmDeleteHistory:
Are you sure you want to delete this history? 
It will not be restored after deletion.
detailModal.debugRecordHelp: Debugging records can help you track the effects and improvements of prompt words
detailModal.debugResultPlaceholder: Please enter debug results or AI response content
detailModal.manualRecordDesc: Manually add debug records to track the effects and improvements of prompt words
detailModal.manualRecordTip: Manual records will be saved to debug history, and will be displayed differently from AI debugging results.
detailModal.noConfigurableVariables: There are no configurable variables for this prompt word
detailModal.noDebugRecords: There is no debugging record yet, you can add records manually or use AI debugging function
detailModal.notesPlaceholder: Optional: Add notes, such as debugging environment, parameter settings, etc.
detailModal.recordTitlePlaceholder: Please enter the record title, for example: first debugging result
detailModal.selectDebugRecord: Please select a debug record to view details
detailModal.selectUsageRecord: Please select a usage record to view details
detailModal.unfilledVariablesTip: Unfilled variables were detected, please fill in on the right to generate a complete prompt word

promptManagement.historyDescription: Version history, you can preview and rollback to previous versions
promptManagement.historyPreviewDesc: You can view detailed information of historical versions and rollback to this version after confirmation
promptManagement.manualAdjustmentPlaceholder: Enter instructions on how to adjust the prompt, e.g., 'Add more details', 'Simplify language'...
promptManagement.manualAdjustmentTip: AI will adjust the current prompt content based on your instructions
promptManagement.maxTagsError: You can add up to 5 tags only
promptManagement.noAIConfigAvailable: No AI configuration available, please add configuration in AI Config page first
promptManagement.noCategories: No categories, please create a new category on the left
promptManagement.noPrompts: No prompts yet, come create the first one!
promptManagement.noVariablesInVersion: No variables configured in this version
promptManagement.outputImprovedPrompt: Please output the improved complete prompt:
promptManagement.subtitle: Manage and organize your AI prompt library
promptManagement.tabEditDesc: Edit prompt content and configure variables
promptManagement.tabHistoryDesc: View version history, preview and rollback
promptManagement.title: AI Prompts
promptManagement.variableTip: Use {{variableName}} format in the left content to auto-detect variables

quickOptimization.configNamePlaceholder: Enter configuration name, e.g., More Concise, More Rich, etc.
quickOptimization.promptTemplatePlaceholder: Enter prompt template, use {{content}} as placeholder
quickOptimization.subtitle: Manage quick optimization options when editing prompts
quickOptimization.title: Quick Optimization Prompt Configuration
